evaluation_metrics.name: Clarity of Instructions
evaluation_metrics.description: How clear and unambiguous are the instructions in the prompt?

evaluation_metrics.name: Completeness of Information
evaluation_metrics.description: Does the prompt provide all necessary context and information?

evaluation_metrics.name: Alignment with Objectives
evaluation_metrics.description: How well does the prompt align with the intended objectives?

evaluation_metrics.name: Token Efficiency
evaluation_metrics.description: How efficiently does the prompt use tokens to convey information?

evaluation_rubric.5: Excellent - Exceeds expectations in all aspects
evaluation_rubric.4: Good - Meets expectations with minor improvements possible
evaluation_rubric.3: Adequate - Meets basic requirements but needs improvement
evaluation_rubric.2: Needs Work - Partially meets requirements but has significant issues
evaluation_rubric.1: Inadequate - Does not meet minimum requirements

evaluation_workflow.description: Review the prompt for basic completeness and clarity
Score the prompt against each evaluation metric
Calculate the weighted score based on metric weights
